job description:
Master Data Analyst
If you are a Master Data Analyst with at least 5 years' master data experience, please read on!

What You Will Be Doing
  • Apply SAP MM, Customer, Vendor and Finance knowledge to create and maintain all master data
  • Represent and enforce department policies, guidelines and procedures
  • Enforce SOPs to control master data integrity
What You Need for this Position
  • At least 5 years' master data SAP experience (MM, Finance, Pricing, Vendors, Customers)
  • Customer and vendor master creation experience
  • Able to act autonomously and develop preventative measures
NOT REQUIRED BUT PREFERRED - knowledge of one or more:
  • Microsoft Dynamics AX
  • GS1, Data Sync and/or 1WorldSync
  • LSMW, WinShuttle and/or HP Functional Testing, etc.
What's In It for You
We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package that includes health insurance, a retirement plan, PTO, and fitness reimbursement.

So, if you are a Master Data Analyst with at least 5 years' master data experience, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
